title: The One Piece Podcast - Episode 1 Discussion
author: The One Piece Podcast
description: Long-running One Piece podcast that has covered the series from the beginning, including discussions of Episode 1 and the Romance Dawn arc.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Podcast covers current episodes, so earlier episode discussions may contain future spoilers

title: We Are! Reading One Piece - Volume 1 Discussion
author: We Are! Reading One Piece Podcast
description: A spoiler-free podcast where friends read through One Piece from the very beginning, discussing one volume at a time. Their first episode covers Volume 1, which includes Episode 1's content.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Spoiler-free discussion of Volume 1 / Episode 1 only

title: One Man, One Piece - Episode 1 Review
author: One Man, One Piece
description: A podcast where the host reviews one episode of the One Piece anime series every week, starting from Episode 1.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Episode-by-episode format, only discusses content up to current episode

title: A Deep Dive into One Piece Episode 1: A New Beginning
author: Animixly
description: An in-depth analysis article examining the themes, character introductions, and significance of One Piece's first episode.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: May contain references to later story developments

title: One Piece Episode 1 Review
author: GameRant
description: A review of One Piece's first episode discussing its impact, character introductions, and how it set up the series.

title: 'One Piece' Episode 1 Recap - The Pirates Are Coming!
author: Collider
description: A detailed recap of One Piece Episode 1, covering the plot, character introductions, and key moments from the episode.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Full episode recap but no future spoilers

title: Hiroshi Kitadani Interview: 'ONE PIECE' TV Anime & 'We Are!' Pirates
author: Billboard
description: An interview with Hiroshi Kitadani about performing 'We Are!', the opening theme for Episodes 1-47, and its cultural significance.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Focuses on the East Blue Saga opening theme

title: One Piece Anime First Opening Theme Song 'We Are' on The First Take
author: Siliconera
description: Article covering Hiroshi Kitadani's performance of 'We Are!' on The First Take, celebrating the iconic opening theme from Episode 1.

title: Classic One Piece Opening On 'The First Take' Blows Millions of Fans Away with Nostalgia
author: Tokyo Weekender
description: Coverage of the viral performance of 'We Are!' by Hiroshi Kitadani on The First Take, discussing the nostalgia and cultural impact of Episode 1's opening theme.

title: Hiroshi Kitadani - We Are! [THE FIRST TAKE]
author: THE FIRST TAKE
description: Hiroshi Kitadani performs the iconic One Piece opening theme 'We Are!' from Episode 1 in a single take, 25 years after the anime's debut.
